item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK ON WHY SPACE SOLAR IS ESSENTIAL FOR KARDASHEV PROGRESS â€œTo make any progress on a Kardashe...
item.description: ELON MUSK ON WHY SPACE SOLAR IS ESSENTIAL FOR KARDASHEV PROGRESS â€œTo make any progress on a Kardashev 2 scaleâ€¦ you really have to have your solar power in deep space.â€ These late 2025 comments remain central as AI energy demands grow and orbital deployments advance into 2026. He notes Earth receives only a tiny fraction of the Sunâ€™s output, limiting terrestrial scaling. Space allows access to vastly more continuous energy without atmospheric losses. Why it matters: This frames energy constraints not as limits but as incentives to expand off-planet, enabling meaningful steps toward stellar-scale utilization. Source: Elon Musk on X, November 2025 â€” Topic: AI Scaling and Kardashev Framework
